List of concepts:

Idea #0000:
	None of the dark-trio/dark-hearted have any natural innate zarakite-telekinesis as an ability of their species.  None of them ever did, and none of them ever will.  None of them were ever able to, and none of them ever will be able to.  None of them will ever be allowed or able to have such TK unless they become some type of species that is a creation of Zare [Zare of SkyCrown, divine being and magical sky dragon of planet-Earth-origin] which such Zare controls and is responsible, and is also able to control and manage responsibly and safely.

Idea #0001:
	All beings that are creations of Zare and Zare's offspring [direct and indirect], including creations from scratch as well as beings created out of existing living creatures that are some species to begin with, must live by and enforce and be bound by and ruled by and maintain zarakite values, both voluntarily and involuntarily, both willfully and instinctively, naturally and intuitively, and also like doing so, and also want to do so, and also like other creations of Zare to do the same, and also want other creations of Zare to do the same, and also enforce other creations of Zare to do the same, and also allow other creations of Zare to do the same, and also make able other creations of Zare to do the same, and also encourage other creations of Zare to do the same, and also discourage all creations of Zare from not doing the same.  These things apply life-long and permanantly sustained for the entire lifetimes of all creations of Zare, including well after death, and including into and beyond any reincarnation and the future lifetimes and future afterlives of all creations of Zare.  All of these statements in this idea/set-of-concepts is good according to zarakite values and lacking evil according to zarakite values and wanted and liked and desired by Zare of SkyCrowne and Proto.  Therefore, all of these things are naturally despised and hated by the dark-trio/dark-hearted who also want to - fight, suppress, thwart, ruin, sabotage, destroy, kill, prevent, delay, stall, diminish, reduce, belittle, disempower, trivialize, discredit, avoid, escape from, set up to fail, scapegoat, gaslight, slow down, bully, threaten, lie to, delude, lead astray, confuse, hate, vilify, demonize, make an enemy of, make everyone's enemy, curse, cripple, punish, outlaw, make illicit, condescend, scold, make look stupid, make appear to be dangerous to everyone, torture, traumitize, slay, kill, conquer, imprison, condemn, deprive, impovrish, refuse to love, pretend to love as one of many deceptions, be silent about as one of many deceptions, spy on, micromanage, over-investigate and be nosy into and violate the privacy of, overcontrol, bully, force, be rough on, set up to fail, sicken, want medicated, subject to evil medical, make unsustainable, decieve, lie to, be dishonest to, leave clueless, mind read, mind control, thought control, make evil, isolate, remove freedom from, subject to injustice, subject to pain, put through suffering, prevent having pleasure, prevent from being young, make unhealthy, make old, make disabled, make ugly and unattractive to the zarakite sex drive, enslave, refuse to cooperate with yet at times pretend otherwise - such aformentioned creations of Zare including Zare's species himself, as well as all reincarnations of such, always, for forever and a day.

Idea #0002:
	The dark trio and their values are not into hunting as any part of their lifestyles, and shun such, and leave such to those with zarakite values.  'Hunting' in this context refers to what Earth-origin carnivores do, for food and nutrition of their species, their individual selves as well as others of their kind.  Hunting for sport however, is another story, referring to going out and slaying another living creature who is innocent and never did anything to such an aforementioned 'hunter' to begin with, and isn't being hunted as prey for food or for use of their body parts [the anatomy of the prey] for any technology [fur and skin for clothing, bones to make into carving tools, etc].  Bullying an innocent who never bothered one's self to begin with is evil, plain and simple, easily irrefutable, according to zarakite values, and not among sky boy personalities found in dragon boys, and not tolerated in sky children, though such evil is found among dark hearted and dark trio, and not against dark-trio/dark-hearted values, and loved/favored/enjoyed by dark-trio/dark-hearted personalities while hated/despised/shunned among zarakite personalities, and also illicit and prohibited in SkyCrowne for dragon boys and sky children and many sky boy clans.  Dark clans of sky boys, if, have exceptions if Zare supports and allows such.  Note that 'dark' when referring to sky boy races is not intended to refer to physical appearance, but to character and to good versus evil in one's personality and nature.

Idea #0003:
	Paul S Reeves would never make a good musician.  He lacks the - creativity, personality, brain type, imagination, intellect - for such, as well as any natural potential to easily develop skills for playing musical instruments and songwriting.  He at one point tried to learn guitar, but flunked, and never could take it very far.  Also, if he were to hypothetically become a guitarist, which itself isn't likely, but irregardless if we were to look at an odd and illogical and improbable reality that can't be where he were a guitarist as a given concept for such a hypothetical reality, he would play acoustic guitar, and folk music, and play acoustic guitar at a campfire in late 20th century American human culture, and in past centuries play a mandolin or something in preceding centuries, in human cultures, and possibly be some sort of a bard as such.  By comparison, Proto and zarakite-dragon-likes-and-dislikes never would like being a middle-age-Euroupean bard in human culture, disliked bards in Dungeons and Dragons, disliked the character 'Iolo' in Ultima video games but was stuck with him of course in many adventures because of the videogame plotlines [Side note:  Someone or someones intelligently grouped together related concepts, to help, by making aformentioned 'Iolo' a guy into wielding a crossbow for a weapon, taking his wife along for the adbventure, and having an unpleasant dorky style of crackpot humor with the likeness of a combination of - Ron Marchie, Monty Python, Chris Sandusky - as well as an unsafe and evil schoolyard bully fuck-over personality that Ron Marchie had at times that would cross the line and really go below the belt, and also be wearing a beard all the time, as well as being an old man who is anything but young and is a dangerous old fool yet also a drunk who plays dumb all the time and isn't a good companion or ally but instead a dangerous loose cannon who isn't trustworthy and is always hiding something, and is playacting an alchohol-drinking and drug-using and law-breaking criminal-minded teenager who has anything but serious respect for authority and is also chauvenistic and sexist both beyond belief, never honest for the most part, and a coward who would run off at any time with his own agenda, someone who might or might not show up to be somewhat helpful but would irregardless not be trustworthy or dependable, or reliable, and would certainly run off and be a coward in the face of a simple stand-up swordfight, pretending to be a companion at other times.  Iolo, as a personality, as well as Ron Marchie, would be very difficult to motivate to get to do anything useful, and would be anything but reliable if one wants to ask him for something, as anything close to a 'friend'.  Such personalities also hate and despise following rules, and hate it when corruption is stamped out, and love it when plenty of corruption and rule-breaking and tomfoolery is rampant and everywhere.  Proto was also never really fond of crossbows of any sort in Dungeons and Dragons or most video games, and didn't like the ones in non-midieval-fantasy video games either, like Deus Ex Classic's mini-crossbow which Proto was never a fan of.  Proto also noticed during the 1990s that Paul S Reeves and using a crossbow of some kind seemed to go together in Proto's head quite easily, and also recalls when Paul Reeves would talk about repeating crossbow firing mechanisms and such, and it would be 'his type of thing' meaning a Paul Reeves thing, which of course one could also say is a Dark Hearted Prince type of thing.].  Regarding music, Paul S Reeves, over the years, has been into - Led Zepplin, Mick Jagger, jazz, older forms of music that precede heavy metal but were not what Proto would call heavy metal, Woodstock-era music, hippy-cultures of the nineteen-sixty-shit-something years, 'flower-power' crap, bell-bottoms, drugs and LSD and stoners freaking everywhere that one could smell downwind from the next continent over, bloody fuck, Industrial music including what unfortunately goes into Rammstien [fucker] but mostly a lot of industrial and techo stuff of various sorts although for some reason he didn't seem to get too much into KMFDM now that I think about it, huh...   That 'Destiny' thing is calling, according to guides.  'Grown up' he's been into touring with The Eagles as well as some hip-hop bands in Euroupe and Africa, and he's also toured with Justin Bieber.  He gets to know musicians closely and on a personal level, not just 'professional', and establish mundane pretense for being familiar with and being able to start a logical casual conversation about their personal lives the way a typical mundane ordinary human being would start a conversation.  He's had plenty of talks and started plenty of conversations about personal lives of aformentioned musicians, as well as AFI, Three Days Grace, Amy Lee from Evanescence whom he says presents herself as a 'goth chick' or something but really isn't such behind her public stage personality [I can't recall the fine points of the conversation off-hand], Justin Bieber whom he [Paul S Reeves] claims could get a lucrative post-celebrity career with cars/automobiles and stuff quite easily if only he were responsible and not a shit-head brat that is incompetant thanks to what the dark hearted prince quite likely turned Mr Beiber into behind the scenes.  Paul S Reeves also mentioned that Michael-Cummings/Spider of Powerman 5000 is 'fun on stage' yet Proto never asked for further details including whether or not he actually toured with them or not [I wouldn't jump to conclusions], and also worked with Chad from Nickelback and is aware of how he has sex with underage human girls from his audience and even bribes his own security manager to get away with such illegal acts at his concerts, yet for whatever reason it isn't like the police or the FBI in the USA [Nickelback is Canadian] can really do anything about it, given Paulists and their natures.  For the record, it hasn't been established whether or not such 'Chad' is a victim of Paulism or is himself/itself/herself [yikes] a Paulist.  Also for the record, there seems to be hints of an evil Josh Kohler in Chad, as well as Iolo, and some of the other problem personalities and identities and humans like them in some ways.  Proto never did actually get to know the literal, actual Mr Josh Kohler that well, both during and after school at the Lorain County vocational school, one of two where Proto studied auto mechanics, and had another Josh from the chosen list included from such who had blond hair and a blond beard and a girlfriend in class, as well as another original on the list of chosen, red-haired cute Chris with dreadlocks who was not part of the auto tech program but was in one of the side classes that included dumb stuff like how to plan a human American culture wedding as well as human species sex ed and human species sexually transmitted diseases where there were photos of penises and erections and related assingments and classroom discussions that students were supposed to get into to pass the class and for their grades [well, hey, Chris was hot and fun to jack off over, once getting home, even though Proto had to drop out of the class before the end of the school year for various reasons then study the same stuff again at Polaris Career Center in Berea.  Proto did pretty much the same thing with both Joshs and a few other students from actually both schools.  As a side note, the disabled kid groups were also present at both schools in different classes that haven't been mentioned, although such were not really attractive to the zarakite sex drive, as sky dragons and other dragon boys have sexual instincts that don't like disabled or downs-syndrome humans yet would like to put their penises into them to mutate them into what they find sexually attractive and fun to hang out with, and as such it's the anticipated aftermath that has any such sexual attraction, not how the damaged humans are to begin with of course.  Chris with his red dreadlocks and adorable face, not to mention the sounds of his vocal cords and such, were already attractive, and vanilla to begin with, with a lot of potential to be so much more, and still do considering he's on the list].

Idea #0004:
	TigerStone personalities are envisioned to be naturally and intuitively brash and anything but diplomatic about their sex drives, and never 'geek out' or laugh or crack up over any of their sex-drive-related behaviors or related conversation, but tend to make other teenage personalities of other faces laugh and crack up and such, and impress teenage boy personalities of both sky boy and human species quite naturally and very easily without really trying, while such TigerStone-faced boys naturally have a straight face and don't laugh from their hot-shot behaviors or their conversation, but do enjoy their personalities and also enjoy such effects it has on teenage boys of both species and their reactions to themselves.  These qualities are part of what make TigerStone boys very socially popular in-crowd boys among Teenage Target Culture high school populations of both human beings and sky boys, both inside and outside of school, and well desired by teenage boys of both types as friends.  Teenage and pre-teenage boys of both species view TigerStone faced sky boys as a lot of fun and really good friends for reasons that include these.  These qualities of TigerStone faced boys personalities, both personalities as well as sex drive, are precious and well-embraced by the zarakite sex drive as well as zarakite values and SkyCrowne as very good things that lack evil and are also anti-dark-trio and anti-dark-hearted.  Paul S Reeves as one example would scoff at such concepts promoted by sky boys, shaking his head and calling sky boys 'demented' and other things while being dismissive and walking away to have nothing to do with sky boys, and would rather cut off his penis quite happily and without having to really consider such than ever come close to having to live in a cuiture that accepts the sex drives and related culture that sky boys and zarakites have, and Paul S Reeves would never put up with any sex hormones that could lead to acceptance in such a culture in his body, and could never connect with such sexuality.  Such sky boy and zarakite sexuality is unreachable by psychics such as Paul S Reeves, untouchable, too far out of reach and too difficult for him to ever have any hope of claiming or infecting or corrupting such in any way, and he knows this, and he has known about this for quite some time, years, and has made his own preperations for such ahead of time, knowing that zarakites and their sky boys and their sex drives will happen in the future and will have to happen, and have an unbreakable destiny to overcome psychics such as himself as well as other dark-hearted/dark-trio, and that sky boy sex drives and their beyond-belief magical esoteric yet Earth-origin natures with a combination of - magic, teenage boy sex hormones that are beyond what the human species is capable of, Earth-origin carnivore instincts and natures, physical violence as a casual and everyday instinctive and intuitive and easy thing, eternal teenage boy youth that is far beyond what the human species is capable of, teenage boy youthful playfulness, all these things embraced and loved and desired life-long by those who have them as well as zarakite values, all these things so strong and mighty that in some sky boy clans they lead to some boys having them to the point they are actually dragons that at times have to put on their wings with feathered brilliant and magestic plumage that allow them to naturally and easily fly/actually-achieve-flight in casual and everyday ways [it isn't like they have to fill out some beaurocratic form in triplicate with some official in uniform or similar bullshit nonsense to sprout/grow their wings or anything, which is dark trio anyways, and public high school teachers as envisioned will sometimes be laid back and not care if such a dragon boy sits down in a classroom and still has his wings on once the bell rings and class begins, and probably just trusts his students to 'maintain their own personal anatomy, and if they have something biological happen, it's their problem' or whatever] - are an unbreakable and given set of honest and very real things in real that have to overcome such evils of the dark hearted and evils of the dark hearted trio in and accross all worlds and all realms where sky boys be, in any probable and any possible destiny that ever can be.

Idea #0005:
	Sky boy personalities typically don't think about being discreet regarding many sexual behaviors, and will masterbate as well as attach and detach their penises, and milk dragon boys, in plain sight in broad daylight in everyday indoor and outdoor public situations, including on a street corner as well as inside and outside a public shopping mall in public and common areas where people are walking back and forth, and can easily see and look at as well as touch and massage a sky boy's penile anatomy and other parts of his abodmen and skin and body parts both above and below the waistline, and underneath his clothing, casually, including while in the middle of a common everyday conversation that could be about trying to remember what to pick up from a grocery store later as well as what sports game might be on television later in the day.  Sky boys are like this without any need for courage, without trying to be this way deliberately, without thinking about privacy or being discreet, involuntarily and absent-mindedly, and naturally would have to most likely stop and deliberately think about things such as 'privacy' and 'being discreet' regarding having their sexual organs plainly visible as well as behaviors that involve using such body parts yet only when people such as humans would bring such things up in a conversation, and even still not fully understand such concepts from a human species point-of-view or what the dark queen used to call a 'perspective' [and is already losing any psychic claim to, in real life, irregardless of planning].  Such personalities and mindsets are not found naturally within the dark hearted and the dark hearted trio, except of course withing playacting and pretending which typically wouldn't be expected to be flawless as such culture is very unnatural for them [then again, they are very capable natural bullshitters, and dark-hearted/dark-trio are also very natural intuitive liars who by comparison find it difficult and unnatural and requiring stressful deliberate mental effort at times to be honest and straightforward in ways that don't involve deceptions or playing dumb, unlike sky boys who by comparison find it easy and natural and intuitive to be honest and straightforward and will even be ranchy and playful as such while having to be very deliberate and putting mental effort into deceptions and pranks and being sneaky].

Idea #0006:
	Sky boys, intutively and naturally, find it easy to be honest, and such doesn't tire them or drain them, and they have ways of creatively and intelligently being playful and funny, humorous and raunchy, when it comes to being honest, in ways that work with their popular-in-crowd-high-school teenage boy hormone-driven personalities, ways that by the way are different from bookworm and dork intellects which are totally different and unnatural as well as difficult when it comes to language and humor as well as honesty.  The dark trio, by comparison, don't find straightforward non-deceptive honesty to be easy or natural, and when actually being honest in such ways have to force such and the results range from being robot-like and psychopathic and heartless to being mean-spirited-and-threatening-and-dangerous to being neurotic and panic-like and frantic and having a nervous breakdown.

Idea #0007:
	When sky boys act in deception, which includes pranks, as well as evils according to zarakite values, they do so with physical actions and behaviors, and not social skills or language or conversation.  They don't think up lies or dishonest things to say very well, such is difficult for them, involves hesitation and needing time to think and in some cases stalling, and irregardless ends up with unconvincing and pathetic results that are worth making fun of, and their friends ripping on them over at later times.  Such involves all sky boys, all years of age, all ages, all clans, and TigerStone boys are no exception, even multi-headed zarakites.  This also affects hybrids, and hybirds that were recently human and are just getting used to being a hybrid and all the related fun and playfulness and such quickly find that they have to take the bad with the good, just like other things in real life, and find that they can't lie or bullshit very easily anything like what they grew up with.  Humans, as a species, are very dishonest and have to deliberately train themselves with voluntary effort and mental discipline to the point of being a damn religious monk at it to be honest and straightforward even half the time in a literal sense, and the dark trio have a massive extrapolation of such qualities, all three of them.  Dragon boys, both zarakites and half zarakites, have their magical ways to correct this, and their penises which sting and kill most creatures of the worlds in various places have special abilities and unique instincts with human species anatomy, and recreate humans [as evil as humans are, but dragon boys are of the same world of origin and do this anyways, screwball as it is] without killing them and typically without taking their lives away as hybrids that later develop eventually into sky boys, and take away humans' ability to be 'human' about deceptions and lies and honesty, even human teenagers of the most uncouth variety which find that they are even more uncouth and far more playful and have a lot more fun with themselves and their friends than they were before being stung by a dragon boy, and make friends far more easily afterwards of both sky boys and human beings.  Parents of humans that become hybrids do indeed have to put up with difficulties surrounding their children's change in anatomy and habits and how they take care of themselves, as well as their child's requirements for diet and sex, along with regular contact including social and recreational with sky boys, but on the other hand find that their child is naturally honest and doesn't play dumb convincingly without realizing that they are doing so when it comes to TALKING TO THEM in any verbal conversation including very casual ones.  Such parents also find that their sky boy friends are surprisingly honest and easy to ask questions of and get an answer from without any question as to whether or not they are being honest or not.  If a sky boy is being playful during a conversation, it shows, and it's always temporary.  Sky boys who tell lies playfully only do so for a short-lived time, then drop the 'gag' or deception rather quickly only a short while later, typically a few moments, and a few hours long is quite rare.  Sky boys who are laughing playfully and even goofing off as rowdy teenage boys will still pause if they feel someone else 'doesn't get it' and ask a human 'You do realize I was just joking, right?  You sure?' if they feel a human is clueless or doesn't understand, regardless of the human's personality, regardless of the human's gender.  Sky boys are very socially intelligent, and can actually be very cautious and careful around adult female personalities that are non-hostile, TigerStone faced boys especially, who in such cases tend to be more quiet, carefully holding back their teenage boy rowdy nature with effort during a conversation to 'make do' with what they are realistically capable of to come close to being respectful [which they know isn't much]. Idea #0018:

Idea #0019:
	I came up with the idea of making a whole pot of tea with only a single tea bag and a coffee machine, by ripping open the tea bag and putting the contents into the coffee machone with a standard coffee filter, and filling up the machine with plain tap water for a whole 16 (sixteen) cups.  The resulting tea always comes out thick, anything but watery, and very strong.  This technique is a lot better than putting a mug with water into a microwave and having to leave a tea bag in the mug for an hour, and only getting one mug out of it.  This works with any common brand of tea, any type, black tea, green tea, etc, any typical cheap stuff.  [I never tried it with any fancy custom-order tea that one sends out a butler in a limo to get or anything, just regular TEA from the grocery store right down the street for a buck or two, ANY store.]  Cuultyr told people around the apartment building where he lived [19 (nineteen) floors] and at school about this technique, as it wasn't a big secret or anything, and was intended to be common everyday knowledge [for the layperson] that I wasn't trying to be famous for, and I honestly didn't care if anyone knew that I came up with it or not.  Over time, both Mark Schmitz and Ron Marchie [who both lived in the apartment building] pretended that they came up with the idea themselves [individually, nothing to do with each other] and no one else, in different independent conversations that had nothing to do with each other.

Idea #0039:
	Sky boys are almost always technically naked, as their clothing and footwear is part of their body, complete with nerves and sense of touch and temperature that goes to at least one of their brains.  If - ripped, cut, torn, etc -, such clothing naturally regrows itself from involuntary reflexes and regeneration.  Their clothing and footwear are parts of their skin/flesh, and when damaged cause bleeding, dragon blood that glows brightly.  These things also apply to their natural jewelry.  The magical blood of sky boys have a range of opacity that the blood has while maintaining the same color, which is a magic pure blue of planet Earth, an extremely saturated/vibrant pure blue that is not light or dark, the same color as the natural normal color of the iris of a sky boy's eyeballs in a normal healthy state.  When a sky boy's magic is at or near his magic's limit, his blood has the most opacity, a very solid aforementioned blue that doesn't have translucency if such blood is spilled and spread thinly across a non-pourous and non-absorbant surface.

Idea #0041:
	One type of legwear that sky boys can put on are called 'longwinds'.  They are adjustable in length, and both legs in syncronization can be adjusted so that they are more or less baggy.  Such affects the entire legs with constant and steady proportion [having a look that resembles 'bellbottoms', an archaic human synthetic article of clothing made from a different species native to the same planet of origin as sky boys, isn't possible as such].  At the most baggy [sky boys also call it 'loose'], individual legs of longwinds that are stretched out on a flat surface as best as practical [without cutting them or stretching them or otherwise deforming their shape], fan out both left and right at 45 (forty-five) degree angles to form two side edges of sky boy fabric that are perpendicular at a 90 (degree) angle.  When least baggy, or worn 'tight' as a sky boy would describe it in Sky Boy American English, the legs of a sky boy's legwear are still fairly loose and baggy, and easily have enough legroom for three of his legs side-by-side inside each leg of his longwinds if one were to even-out the measurements of the circumference of one of his legs and average/even them out.  As for the length of each leg, they are dynamic and adjusted in sync as well, and can range from reaching just below the kneecap to around the ankles and about 5 (five) centimeters from touching the ground or a flat surface.  A sky boy is born with the instintive and intuitive natural innate shape-shifting ability to use his belly button and wristwatches to shorten and lengthen his longwinds, as well as loosen and tighten them, casually and easily, with negligible depletion of magic when doing so.  Adjusting his longwinds as such isn't necessarily silent, just like all shapeshifting, and if done very slowly is near-silent and suitable for hunting and stalking prey, at least from a distance.  Adjusting his longwinds with major changes in a rapid split-second [akin-to/much-like if he were to deflate or degenerate his neck while detaching it in half a second flat, so his head falls from mid-air above his neck-less body and bounces and rolls depending on the terrain and whatever he might be standing on/in], just like adjusting parts of his flesh of his skin and limbs etc, makes a characteristic noise that all sky boys clearly recognize and are familiar with.  Like all sky boy natural clothing, such parts of a sky boy's physical anatomy in normal three dimensional space where he lives [as opposed to tethered anatomy which is safely and responsibly 'extradimensional' and maintained by elven sky boys who have applicable and sufficient experience and expertise in such, and are more than capable of doing this safely] does not have any sense of physical touch or temperature that his head brain[s] can sense, unlike the flesh of his anatomy.  Also, like other sky boy natural clothing, shape shifting such clothing doesn't come with any sense of touch or temperature from aforementioned shape shifting itself.  Sky boy longwinds have an elastic waistband at the top.

Idea #0042:
	The word 'doof' in Zarakite American English is a slang term for 'idiot' or 'clown', etc, referring to someone who performs an act of stupidity, regardless of their normal intellect and underlying intelligence.

Idea #0043:
	If it ain't broke, don't 'fix' it.
		- Basic common sense, zarakite values and logic
Idea #0044:
	'If it ain't broke, don't 'fix' it' in zarakite logic as well as zarakite logic, is like saying 'If something already works good enough, don't try to [so-called] 'repair' the blasted contraption [it], because do so has the potential to actually make it worse and non-functional by taking it apart completely and putting it back together [or at least trying to] and finding it doesn't work anymore'.  This type of outcome, a machine no longer working by attempting to improve it by taking it apart and doing work on it then attempting to reassemble it, by logic, is in a general sense more likely/probable the more complicated the machine is given a mechanic/technician who has a constant/invariable level of expertise [or lack of such, doof].  One could also say, as a synonamous phrase 'If it's already working and doing it's job, don't mess with it.' and such has the same meaning, more or less.

Idea #0050:
	Sky boys wouldn't explain this to each other, regardless of how old, and regardless of clan, as they understand it already, but the phrase 'If it isn't able to happen, it isn't going to happen' refers to practical basic common sense and logic in both zarakite values and logic that all sky boys and their hybrids have, which describes that if some desired outcome and result is prevented from occuring because of what is not just improbable but is outright impossible, then according-to/by logic such an end-result/outcome/result/effect is not going to occur, any-way-one-looks-at-it/regardless-of-anyone's-opinion/no-matter-how-anyone-thinks-about-it/no-matter-what/any-way-one-slices-it.  As a hypothetical example, if a star is destroyed and turned into loose gas and dust, the star that was destroyed is not going to give light and heat afterwards that sustains life on an inhabited planet that used to orbit the star that had natural and native sentient life on it, and this is because the star is no longer able to do so, and has nothing to do with if the no-longer-existing star 'isn't trying very hard' or 'is spinning it's wheels' or 'has an attitude problem' or 'is upset or bored or something' or 'is hyper' or 'needs to behave itself' or 'needs to calm down' or 'needs to cool it' [It's already DEAD!  No more light and heat!  Hello.....?] or 'doesn't care' or 'is evil' or 'hates itself' or 'hates anyone or anything else' or 'isn't feeling comfortable' or 'isn't sure if it really should or not' or 'isn't paying attention' or 'is irresponsible' or 'isn't ready' or 'has a confidence issue' or 'has a self esteem problem' or 'how it feels about itself' or whether or not the star 'feels it belongs' or 'isn't cut out for something' or whatever.  Simply put, the star doesn't exist any longer, and as such one cannot refute that the star is therefore not going to give what a life-bearing planet used to have so that the planet can sustain any form of life, at least not like what it did back when the star existed.  Also, once the star no longer exists, at that point in itself in the strictest sense according to zarakite values and logic the star is not at fault for not supporting the planet or the life on it, reffering to the behavior of the star at that present tense snapshot point in time when the star already doesn't exist.  As for anything the star did back when it did exist, well, that's another story, and irregardless/beside-the-point.  Further, once the star no longer exists, if one were to recline and think extensively and think deeply for an obscene eternity and a half, and accumulate a mass of knowledge and insight and ideas, that still won't save the life on the planet, and the star will still be GONE.  One who is such a deep thinker can hypothetically think however long they want to in order to try to come up with a 'plan' or 'solution' for making the no-longer-existing-star give continual heat and light and otherwise to sustain the life on the planet as it did back when it existed, yet such a 'solution' simply doesn't exist, because sometimes, just sometimes, dear salt-head, something isn't just improbable, it's a thing called 'impossible', and there isn't any such 'solution'.  Begging for an answer from an almight truly omniscient oracle that is actually and literally all-knowing of all worlds in an entire universe and knows all of every single sub-atomic particle of such and the history of every such particle since the birth of such universe doesn't necessarily mean that such an oracle will actually know of any actual solution or answer, and if asked for a solution, can just say 'there isn't one' flatly in a quick and simple and straight honest response.  If they were bothered by some salthead asking the same question again, the response could be 'The real answer hasn't changed.  Also, don't bother me again thinking that it will.  Trust me, it won't, ever.  That's an absolute truth and absolute honest answer, and it won't change.  Don't bug me again, I'm busy, forever.  Bye!'.  One could say that this is one of those 'irrefutable things' that they just HAVE TO have an understanding of, even if it has to be drilled and pounded into their brain's anatomy or whatever lifeless and useless inanimate heap of s--- they are 'thinking' with, as if.  ['Hey doc, it hurts when I do this!'  'Well, then don't do that!']  Even a mere human, a homo sapiens sapiens species species man, an individual named 'Albert Einstien' came up with his 'definition of stupidity' regarding such a screwball hypothetical, boring as it is, which believe it or not the vast majority of the human speicies thorughout it's history of being intelligent/sentient can actually comprehend and understand quite easily, without effort and without thinking about it and without 'working at it', with quick practical common sense.  As for the rest, those 'intellects' Zare of SkyCrowne would say are mentally ill and irrefutable as such, forver doomed to futility if unchanged.  One can also say 'If something doesn't exist, it can't do anything' and be honest and true about it, as an irrefutable and logical absolute honest truth, at least in this universe, at least where Zare of SkyCrowne and his zarakite values exist.  As for quack-logic and weird theoretical stuff that can't, this author can't help you, at least not with any sort of conversation or communication as he would call it, ever.  For those who actually read this far, yes, this is the long version of the saying in zarakite values, which presumably answers one's questions about the philosophical saying and understanding of how real life works in sanity and lack of delusions, and hopefully elaborates to one's satisfaction, yikes.....

Idea #0051:
	Wandering into a movie theater when half of the film is already halfway over means ending up clueless and not knowing what much of the movie is about, and not enjoying the film either, and therefore as such not worth going to anyways because too much of the film already played, in my experience.  Bothering people watching the film probably wouldn't be a good idea either, as I would imagine that they wouldn't want to put up with explaining what the film was about and what happened and would probably rather watch the rest of the film, not that I've actually tried such a thing, but I typically try to avoid finding out as I don't like to bother people and be an annoying brat.  I would just go see the movie again another time, and see it from the beginning, and then I enjoy it, and I'm not clueless, and I don't have to be stuck with being an annoying brat and ruining the rest of the movie for others as well as still not enjoying the film, versus leaving and watching the whole thing properly by seeing it from the beginning some other time which is what I would do because it is what I should do, for both myself and everyone else at the movie theater, a win-win situation, better for me and better for them.  This means that they enjoy the film, and so do I, and I don't have to be an annoying brat or be someone clueless, which all works and is just common sense that I don't have to really think about, of course.  Such is also logical all the way, how this all just works.  Such logic and practical common sense is natural and commonplace in sky boy personalities, and also very good in zarakite values.  Meanwhile, dark hearted trio would all fake this type of stuff, while not actually doing it, but pretending to do so, while being deceptive and mind reading people back and forth and also mind controlling them left and right and their nature and their souls, and even their children, at the movie theater, en masse, and it's not like anyone would really know or find out, or care.

Even more shocking and revolting to myself is how he is a brash and misbehaving bully, and talks to his boss David Sarif who is the CEO in charge of the company like an unruly child who argues with Mr Sarif like a little kid who has no business working there let along graduating high school and not being in the detention hall on a regular basis. I find it odd and anything but realistic, even SANE on David Sarif's part, that he doesn't fire Adam Jenson for being such a brat and pain in the butt with Jenson's behavior on a daily basis, as a 'normal' type of thing for his company. Idea #0085:

One can also state it as 'I stand not bemused' which is very formal, when everyone in the room is an arisrocrat and surrounded by bodyguards left and right in the throne room, with foreign diplomats everywhere for one of the bigger history-making peace treaties or something [and not the bash that comes afterwards when the party balloon go up, you get the idea...]. 	One can also say that they are 'not bemused' in a diplomatic conference to explain that they are being serious-minded and in some cases very literal, and cut through any misunderstandings because they don't speak Zarakite languages very well, and don't know the right body language, and don't appear to be taken seriously and need a way to say that.  They can also do this by adding '..., and I am not bemused', which is also like saying '..., and I'm not joking or being sarcastic, and just want to be sure we're on the same page.'  As far as whether someone is simply being serious, or ticked off as well, this varies, but either way one should be careful with a diplomat to avoid making a bad first impression with them, of course.  As such, if one is to assume that there is any implied emotion conveyed, they should assume it is negative.  They could always ask, of course.  'Were you offended?' is what could be spoken in some form.

Idea #0086:

If someone says in a diplomatic conversation 'I appreciate that but I did not seek your counsel [regarding that matter]' in a private diplomat-to-diplomat conversation outside of the conference room, this is one way that one diplomat can say to another who isn't from the same world ['world of origin' if you want to be picky] 'Hey, I didn't ask' or 'Hey, thanks, but I didn't ask' [the 'thanks' here is actually sarcastic, but to be polite, even if said with a bit of anger that is being held back so it simply comes out as being annoyed].  If a diplomat says 'I appreciate that but I did not seek your counsel' in a non-private setting, such as in the middle of a big meeting to negotiate a trade agreement, or maybe where two different cultures' militaries are going to mutually consider a dividing territorial common border to be [before some uniformed official asks for a 'green card' or says 'ahem, papers please...'], then the diplomat might be being formal and be politely telling someone they didn't ask for any input, but they also might be telling someone to f--- off and 'shut up' if they say it with a growl, which means of course that someone was [initially] rude with their commentary, and then the other diplomat was irratated and telling the first guy to close his mouth [and keep it that way, lest he have his clock cleaned and his a-- kicked in and bleeding profusely out the other side to be mopped up by the local housekeeping after the meeting and properly disposed of and tucked away compliant with sanitation standards in a cool dry place, use your imagination].

Idea #0102:

Such priest characters in his fantasy role-playing campaigns could also peform exorcisms as well as turn the undead and such priests would also cast plenty of magic spells and such and would do so as humans.  Such priests had their magic spells also deal with possession and such and also involve demons and other wierd beings of various worlds and Aarakocra were also involved in Paul's campaigns and fantasy worlds. I know about these things and know they happened and are fact because I witnessed such in mundane ways with my eyes and ears just as any healthy ordinary human being would and it wasn't like I was psychic or any sort of mind reader or anything.  Mike Warnick was also a witness to such things in the exact same way.  Mike Warnick also loved to play such aforemnentioned priest characters that never would be allowed to exist in real life. Idea #0596:
	Paul Samuel Reeves always had a personality where he thought that everyone should do things his way and his way only, and that 'his way' was 'THE way' [as in no one else has a right to have their own way or even their own opinion].  He would sometimes use his own name to refer to 'his way' when talking out loud and whining and complaining in a whiny voice making conversation about how he hated the way humans would act and behave at times and he would say that people were not doing the right thing according to his opinions and his values by 'not doing it the Paul S Reeves way'.  He would criticize and scold humans behind their back with the way they would drive their cars, fix their cars, program computer software including video games, run their governments, teach and educate the masses regarding the laws of physics, establish their [human, again] 'laws of gravity' in scientific physics taught in high schools and higher education and Paul would also complain and whine like a complaining upset little boy about how the human theories of how gravity works is 'flawed' according to his criticism and such.  These conversations didn't come up too often but he seemed to be some unhappy person who didn't manage his emotions very well and would keep things bottled up and then once in a while at random he would involuntarily have whining outbursts he didn't manage or control very well where he would talk and talk and talk like a little upset boy about how human didn't understand logic or science or their own laws and theories of physics and gravity and astronomy and string theory very well and perpetuated their ideas in schools and universities and they were all messed up as well as offensive to him according to his opinions.  He would do this with uncontrolled mundane verbal outbursts and tirades at times, mouthing off out loud and a bit vocal just like a human being would use their lips and vocal cords to do the exact same sort of thing.  His non-human intelligence and sceintific and cultural knowledge would be given away when he would do this, with his guard let down, and his usual tactics for secrecy and delusion and induced amnesia and other ways of covering up his blunders not working on myself of course.  It's no wonder he preferred to distance himself from me over the years including during as well as outside of school and he favored moving away and also not answering phone messages or emails for more than a year or two at a time for holidays and birthdays and made himself very difficult to get a hold of over recent decades and wouldn't typically be up for conversation about ANYTHING.  He also avoids doctor's offices and hospitals and nursing homes and other such 'medical' places like the plague and over the years would never willingly visit anyone in such places and with lifelong history and pretense wouldn't be caught dead visiting myself in a nursing home even though I'm not in a locked unit.  He's always been like that.  Also once he move out after high school he refused, for DECADES, to have any doctor for any ordinary boring common checkup and also refused to have any dentist as well.  Talk about avoiding everything medical and everyone caught up in it.  Also he reluctantly drove himself to a small-town rural emergency room after having a heart attack at the age of 22 (twenty-two) and not calling any paramedics or 911 about it.  He was also into jogging and exercising at the time and not being overweight and also getting into running and sprinting and developing ab muscles that would visibly show at one point and he actually got punished for developing such a body and physique and atheletic lifestyle as he really wasn't supposed to do that sort of thing on planet Earth and was breaking rules.  He always did however favor very broad shoulders and a pronounced curvature of the spine that humans have and would never have any straight-as-an-arrow spine that zarakites and sky boys would have.  He would never put up with being very skinny including having narrow shoulders and muscles that arn't too big, and instead he has always favored bulky muscles and a lot of brawn and being like Arnold Schwarzenegger and idolizing such a physique and at the same time he was usually okay with having at least some belly fat over the decades or more accurately I suspect he was supposed to pretend to if he were following rules for himself on planet Earth.  He also has always had somewhat wavy hair that if grown long would never naturally hang straight.  He sometimes grew long hair during teenage years which he would love to either have in a ponytail or have braided.  He also didn't ever mind the idea of having any receding hairline or 'distinguished' look to his hairline.  Either that or he was pretending to and was following rules.  He never seemed to mind having a sportcoat or wearing a necktie and always seemed naturally comfy and at ease doing such things and seemed to favor and enjoy such over the decades.  He was also always a whiny unhappy teenager who never developed a human teenager personality and never seemed to want to and always seemed to want childhood and teenage years to be over and done with as soon as possible.  He never seemed to be interested in fun or recreation as any teenagers have in American culture if aforementioned teenagers are law-abiding and not stoners or drug-using alchohol-drinking types, and he seemed like healthy fun as an American teenager would have it was 'beneath him' and 'inferior' and always seemed far more interested in 'grown up' lifestyles with neckties and wedding tuxedos and sportcoats and getting married and being done with school and starting careers and maintaining long careers and being too old for video games and skateboarding and such.  He was also into woodstock and the side of it that was always stoned and high and passing out and 'meditating' [comatose from brain damage which he turns into the same thing] from LSD and 'smoking weed' and drinking alchohol and such.  He was also big into going to bars over the years.  He would also make fun of humans doing these sorts of things and would be 'do as I say but not as I do' and 'rules apply to everyone other than me but not myself' in his own ways and not really the same ways as Sally Lynn Reeves would do in her own ways over the decades.  Despite going out to bars and dancing and concerts so often he would somehow always be an outcast of sorts and would not really make or keep friends or socialize as any human would, and he also had more than one obvious mid-life crisis over the decades where he wouldn't leave his house in Nevada and wouldn't answer the phone or any emails and wouldn't talk to his next-door neighbors and wouldn't talk to Sally Lynn Reeves either.  He also wouldn't go to 'work' as his so-called 'career' in the entertainment industry.  On the other hand it wasn't like his finances were ever in any danger or his investment or other banks accounts of various sorts as well as retirement nest egg[s] at any time as he didn't have to actually work any job and could do what he wanted whenever he wanted to and his 'mommy' and 'daddy' always had plenty of inheritance money from so many relatives who died and left last wills that for whatever mysterious reasons 'accidentally' disappeared or were not found and ended up in his hands in many cases along with property and other stuff which of course the 'younger brother' was never to find out about or discover if they had their ways. Idea #0772:
	I've uploaded wireframe renders from Blender software as well as data files I've created with Blender myself, so that hopefully failsafe teams can learn Blender and also look at the 3D model files I've created and get better information on TigerStone faces and how they look as well as the tangent mapping methods I've used etc.  Blender is open-source software that is free of cost and can be downloaded by the public from the Internet at https://www.blender.org/ and is cross-platform [Windows, Linux, Mac, and others, many distros have packages and repositories etc] and has plenty of tutorials and how-to guides on Youtube as well as the Wikipedia and numerous other websites that include videos and diagrams and examples and wikimedia on-line Internet books.  It can also export into other modelling and CAD programs and plenty of other software can import Blender files.  A few of the models based upon human being anatomy come from a program called Makehuman originally, from Sourceforge as well as more recent versions that are on it's own site after the project got a new maintainer.  At least one of the original 3D humanoid models I started with was from the old maintainer back when Makehuman was an academic open-source project.  Hopefully this will clear up misunderstandings and misinterpretations left and right about what Tiger SwiftWing's face and a TigerStone sky boy's face looks like at at least age five and maybe age four.  The wireframe renders have the wireframe topology superimposed over the textured rendered look that includes tangent mapping and full shaders applied.  The Blender files also contain meshes that have 'HD' or 'High Detail' versions of the meshes with a much higher poly-count before simplifiying body part meshes for realtime videogame rendering for prototypical video games using Irrlicht and C++ as well as Unity and Unreal.  Many of the files made with Blender have also been used with GIMP which is also open-source and something like PhotoShop but free of charge and open-source and also cross-platform, as well as also available for download from the public Internet.  As a side note back when I used my old Alienware Aurora desktop that Remington Philips and Art Bibbs and compromised failsafe teams broke and messed with, I got openGL graphics with Blender running at actual 128x anti-aliasing with SLI enabled and a special utility to enable certain graphics with NVIDIA-based video cards that arn't options offered in the standard NVIDIA control panel as most consumers and video game players wouldn't understand those technical options and break stuff and don't program OpenGL and Vulkan and C and C++ etc anyways.  Most also wouldn't bother trying to hand-make their own custom OpenGL backend from scratch with C++, much less GLFW and GLEW and a whole bunch of other stuff in the 'programming' and 'progs' folders I've uploaded.  I'm suprised that many C++ developers don't seem to take advantage of texture arrays in their graphics engines like Irrlicht, as they just work and don't require re-binding every darn texture in a scenegraph one-at-a-time with every loop and refresh and buffer swap etc.....  Okay, this should prove how much of an idiot computer nerd I've been, among other things.  This itself at least simply makes sense.

Idea #0838:
	2019-11-23 19:20  Video game characters of the types that I have created and practiced creating and animated for open-source and other video games are coincidentally modelled and animated in multiple pieces, for technical and practical reasons that work well with computer video game programmers and how video games are made.  This includes video game characters that have the upper half of the body and lower half of the body seperate meshes, as well as the head it's own mesh.  This is very common in video games and video game design and has been for many years.  This offers advantages for animations so that the upper and lower halfs of a humanoid character can more easily have independent animations.  Also if one has a video game with whole squads of humanoid bipedal soldiers and the bodies can look the same and have the same uniforms and same body armor, but the video game developers don't want the soldiers to be clones, they might re-use the same 3D character models [one could also call them 'actors' and then different middleware software development kits for video games often have their own proprietary names for these, note that these words like 'character' and 'model' are not the same as movie actors or any modelling agency or any person who dresses up and playacts or poses in underwear and gets photographed for a living], and then to avoid what look like clones the heads are their own independent meshes with their own textures and their own animations and the heads vary from soldier to soldier, and this has been done with video games for decades including before 3D characters and back in the day when they had side-scrolling arcade-style video games with 2-Dimensional sprites.  Ron Marchie was at one point watching me demonstrate and explain to him a prototypical video game with a zarakite in it that I put together with Irrlicht and B3D models and C++ and had a single character walking and running and flying around a single large square of terrain with trees and a lake and bushes here and there and randomly but also procedurally generated terrain and placement of the trees and water etc.  [I spent a lot of time practicing and developing those types of prototypical games with randomly generated seed variables and then everything procedurally generated from them.]  The prototypical game that I showed Ron Marchie had flaws and at one point out of blind dumb luck the upper and lower halves of the actor flew apart into seperate meshes and one was a little bit out of sync with the other one with animations and the nodes for the meshes with a scenegraph which means that the meshes were not depicted/rendered in the same locations in three dimensional space as depicted in the little demo.  [Granted a 'scenegraph' and 'nodes' can mean a whole bunch of things depending on the engine used and Irrlicht has it's own system.]  Ron Marchie made his own raunchy dumb jokes about the bipedal model looking like it was coming apart because of the sync issue and how that version of Irrlicht had problems with parenting an animated mesh to another animated mesh with it's own parent node.  [This is technical computer programming stuff that video game developers use, with some of the technical terms and jargon used having their own meanings specific to Irrlicht.]  After Ron Marchie did that, I'm not sure who did what with his words or his jokes, or what they turned into, or who had what technical expertise and actually understood what was being joked about and what was going on and who might not have and might have said something like 'I'm not a computer geek and don't know that stuff but I can [psychic hub whatever] with Ron's joke without knowing what I'm talking about or what Ron was making fun of.'.

Idea #0983:
	2019-12-05 01:07  I remember when Remington Philips at Tri-C, back when both he and I worked as student employees for the college campus police, lied to someone who came into the police department office needing something and we were both working and both at the front desk and Remington Philips took me by surprise by telling a visitor from the public who walked in that I was a police detective and police officer.  I had no idea Remington Philips would do that and I wouldn't have wanted him or asked him to do something like that.  Right after the person who needed something left the office I was angry at Mr Remington Philips and I told him that he should not have lied and made me look like a police officer and police detective like that and I didn't want him to ever do anything like that again.  In the state of Ohio it is a criminal offense to impersonate a police officer and I was taught this by police officers there and also my supervisor a police Sergeant as part of what I had to know and was expected to be familiar with to work there and be employed there at the campus police department and take very seriously as a condition of working there and not being fired or worse being indicted.  My Sergeant explained when I was learning how to work there that it was indeed a real law enforcement department and he had to be professional and he did in fact in his own past out of being professional as a police Sergeant and supervisor sometimes not only terminate but also indict past student employees at Tri-C DPS [Department of Public Safety which is the campus police department for Cuyahoga Community College which is also known as 'Tri-C'] on criminal charges when they would misbehave and break rules of working in the police department offices.  He [Sgt Jerome T Klue MPA who also goes by 'Jerry'] was tough on corruption in that he didn't tolerate it among his officers or any student assistants who worked for him and it is this zero-tolerance tough policy that actually got him a lot of respect and a very notable and honorable reputation in law enforcement in the State of Ohio and in more than one county and multiple police departments and also the Cuyahoga Country Sheriff Dept and other places as well.  He taught me that even as a student employee at the college police department that 'you have to identify yourself' properly which means that you have to be honest with who you are and are not and not just verbally but also in wearing a proper uniform and presenting yourself honestly and properly and it's not any kind of a joke and yes it is a very serious crime to mislead the public into thinking that you are something you are not such as a police officer or police detective if you are not and it is also very bad to lie and decieve and mislead the public into thinking that someone else is a police officer or detective or something that they are not.  He also taught me quite a few other things and he had to in order to be professional as a law enforcement official and supervisor and shrug off more than one corruption probe where police officers would act like little children both in uniform and off-duty in more than one police department.  He was also dead serious about background checks and in many cases doing things by the book and refusing to tolerate anyone with a lazy attitude who would pretend to get work done.  He wouldn't tolerate anyone refusing to obey orders and be defiant and act like a little girl with a teenage attitude and I witnessed right in front of me first-hand and so did Remington Philips how he was very angry and yelled at a female student employee like a mountain lion 'If you dare disrespect me like that again you are THROUGH here!' when the female student employee was doing that and then I and others in the office witnessed first-hand how he fired her on the spot.  She never worked there again.  She was, by the way, a female college student there who had the name 'Leia' as in 'Princess Leia' from Star Wars and she was European and she acted at times like Jenny Hartline and also at time acted like Sally Lynn Reeves and she was very much like a teenage girl human being in the way she acted who would not always follow rules and would prank and manipulate others in the office and would be a bully at times and would do police reports and also fire guns at the police department range even though she was not a police officer and she was a student employee there and she was also very intelligent and socially intelligent at that and she did know how to set up others to fail like the back of her hand and discredit and lie about and make others look bad if they were opponents as well as co-workers and even allies of hers.  I handwrote about this before and how Remington Philips and others witnessed these things as well as Carl Hodges as well while I worked there and while they worked there.  Remington Philips and Carl Hodges both made conversation about these things here and there over the months and years I worked there and the comissioned police officers who worked there did indeed listen and sometimes talk about it as well to myself and each other.  Also Leia or however her name is spelled [I sometimes use 'sp?' inside brackets to refer to how I'm not sure if I spelled something correctly, as always] didn't get to keep working there and was a menace and was never allowed or supposed to work there or in law enforcement or as an enforcer there or on planet Earth ever again and so she didn't, and the same thing happened to Carl Hodges who was an African American man who seemed nice and friendly and sincere but had his own problems and I actually didn't witness anything and there was talk and I cannot confirm or deny something I did not witness.  Jerry Klue by the way is Ukranian but also a good solid American and Patriot and he and his family are very solid upstanding American citizens and he has been honored and respected quite notably in the past and so has either his father or grandfather who was a war hero for the USA who won medals and decorations of sorts and had his uniform on display at the college out of respect and honor for what he did for his country and the USA. Larry was playing games about a moving van and movers and so was Tom Damacio and so was Matthew Damron and also plenty of others especially when this 'type five' thing happened [Look, I can't define 'type five' if someone asked me to type out what it refers to so I'm a bit clueless about that as well and I don't know why it is called that or the number five and someone has a lot of explaining to do becasue I still don't know SQUAT about even half of this stuff.].  I also wanted to get a job to pay my rent and so I got a job application and needed a personal reference from at least two people.  I was shocked and felt betrayed by what I thought was an ordinary mundane normal and boring archaic human named John Haldeman who lived on the fourteenth floor as I would have thought he would be a personal job reference and he was that kind of a friend and I was wondering what the fuck was going on with him asking day after day 'What?  You actually went and got the job application?' and I told him 'yes' each time simple and straight and also when he refused to be a personal reference for getting hired a the grocery store so I could pay bills and my credit card debt and not get evicted and he spontaneously seemed to back out of a promise to be a personal reference for that crummy mimimum-wage simple job after offering something so trivial and so common and casual for being even a loose friend.  It was really weird but to be fair, I thought he was always the same guy and same person the whole time over all of those years from when I first met him to when I was in the Cleveland Clinic hospital clueless and having no idea what the bloody fuck was going on and never filled in on any of it and I had never heard of possessors or mind controllers or MKULTRA or hypnosis or thought control or vessels and I thought his eyes looked different because of contact lenses but he was I thought still just a normal mundane boring ordinary archaic human being and not a vessel or anything and I had never heard of exosolars or knew what any of that was about and I didn't think he was ever any sort of undercover police officer or special agent but just a boring ordinary guy who was retired and a tool-and-die maker who worked at Tandy Leather and such in the past and was also into carpendry and painting and woodworking and what made me think he was anything more than a diabled diabetic retired man and human and possibly an undercover police officer of some sort was when he was acting unlike his normal self and personality and he said 'Larry has control of all of the cameras and Internet in the whole building' and then he tried to offer me some type of witness protection program like in the 1994 movie 'The Client' with Brad Renfro or the 1993 movie 'The Firm' and offered it more than once and said he would give it to me and set me up with it and he told me to wait in my apartment and he would show up later but then he never came when I was all dressed up and ready to go and he did that several time actually.  Larry Falasca was also doing the same thing and acting like an undercover cop who was suddenly no longer a low-functioning schizophrenic but then seemed to be an undercover police officer or something with a 'cover identity' as a schizophrenic and he was also in my apartment at times telling me what to pack and not pack and prepare for leaving with when looking at coats and jackets and clothing.  John Haldeman and Larry Falasca also seemed to be two undercover cops who were co-workers and with each other and that is what they seemed like and were acting like althgough both seemed like they were acting silly at times and I had no previous experience with or connection points with this type of thing in real life so I thought they were actually undercover cops and I was supposed to be preparing for some witness protection of some kind [things and people and moving cars and their drivers vaporizing and materializing and disentagrating and the same with people while they were walking and witnessing this first-hand while walking to the grocery store and seeing it in the parking lot and outside and inside parts of the building?  Um, yeah, I think I WITNESSED something, like a whole lot of shit that might necessitate PROTECTION of some kind.  Yikes.  Oh and no none of it was telepathic either. [The term 'vampiric' in this case refers to vampire-like in nature, which includes both vampire bats which are real-life non-sentient mundane common animals of Earth-origin in nature, and also includes vampires in folklore and history including the notorious 'Dracula' which has been retold in so many tales and legends and fiction which lack consistency and conflict with each other.]  They [zarakites and all other related boys and girls and people and sky kids etc] are shapeshifters but are not were-wolves or were-creatures either, and do not involuntarily shape-shift with phases of the sun or moon of any world. Video games and Halloween/All-Hallows-Eve vary widely and in modern-day common culture tends to be more loose and less serious-minded and sometimes silly.  'All Hallows Eve' refers to what later became known as Halloween and unfortunately leads to stereotypes that give headaches to serious-minded witches and pagans and practicioners of WitchCraft and not simply Wicca of sorts which are very serious-minded people that are actually practicing a very real religion and way of life and not dressing up for Halloween and should not be confused with trick-or-treaters or comedy movies like 'The Adams Family' or stereotypes of wearing large pointed black hats and having brooms and caulrens and pointed noses which are a big mess left and right. Since then Tarot cards have been used for very serious-minded divination and magical practice and very real religion outside of what is Halloween but year-round and part of more than one religion including not only Wicca but also other types of Witchcraft including Witchcraft outside of Wicca and also Voodoo which is not the same religion and uses Tarot cards and magic from what I've studied and been educated with in the past. Raymond Buckland lived in rural Ohio on a farm for a number of years and last time I checked appeared in at least one YouTube video that might still be there.  Also please don't confuse Wicca with other forms of Witchcraft which pre-date the twentieth century and way back far before the 1950s.  Some of those actually do go back to midevil times and not in fantasy or fiction.  Traditions vary and some require that one have it in their blood or bloodline, meaning that one can only practice that tradition ONLY if they had one or two parents who practiced it.  Others are more loose.  Wicca for example is open to anyone who wants to join and practice and study.  Unfortunately some approach it like some do with Satanism from what I've heard.  I've been taught from what I've studied and heard from talking to people as well as the original dark hearted trio that human beings who practice Satanism fall into two basic groups.  One group is silly and typically teenagers and college students who do it for laughs and giggles and like to dress up and treat it like Halloween any day of the year.  Some are very weird and can't socialize or make friends, and form their own club and like to dress up and watch too much television and silly nonsesne and get too much into certain video games and don't take it seriously.  Other practitioners of Satanism are extremely serious-minded and actually practice a very real religion. I take that with a grain of salt though, if you excuse the pun.  Yeah this is a weird side of me.  Anyways, looking outside of the prince's stories and how deceptive he is over the centuries and millenia and his lifetimes, I point to stories on the news published by law enforcement and an old story on Yahoo news that USA law enforcement was notified by an actual and serious-minded church of Satan from some twit kid who didn't like something at school and wanted some silly curse upon his schoolteacher or whatever from somewhere and so he didn't exactly email a bomb threat but instead tried to contact an actual church of Satan that practices serious minded Satanism and the church, which was established and law-abiding and with a very real street address and easily found in a phone book in the USA, contacted their local police and the authorities sent it to the police at the kid's town where he lived.  The basic message from the church was, more or less, 'No, we are not going to curse and murder your schoolteacher in any sacred ritual because of your report card and we are not going to get involved but because you want them DEAD we are contacting the police' and that's pretty much what they did instead of sending any email reply to the punk kid.  The point of this is that there is a serious-minded church of Satan in the USA that takes their religion very seriously and is not a Halloween 'thing' and is very law-abiding and established with an actual street address and is in phone books.  By comparison, there are serious-minded witches that practice an actual religion and not simply for Halloween and go to work and school and have the same jobs and careers as 'everyone else' among laypeople and also wear a sportcoat and necktie sometimes for photographs and dinners and activities for their religion and where they work some career or job they say 'merry Christmas' around the winter holidays with a smile and are polite about it like everyone else rather than making conversation like a socially inept clown and having to then explain what the heck they are and get into it.  It happens all the time.  Sully Erna by the way from the band Godsmack was like this and he would simply talk music in interviews and only start talking about his religion and things like witchcraft if someone else brought it up in conversation.  That's actually what most serious-minded pagans and witches in modern-day USA do irregardless of their job or whatever they do for a living. If lunch time happens to be at 12:00 noon which is after 11:00 AM and before 1:00 PM then high noon and noon happen to be at the same time for that person that day, as a coincidence.  If lunch time is some other time of day, whether by schedule or it happens to end up that way, then high noon that day is not the same as noon.  Whether anyone double-checks what time of day it is makes no difference.  If high noon and noon happen to be the same for someone one day, then they are the same even if that person never checks the time and even if they don't bother finding out and this has nothing to do with if they remember or even bother thinking about it.      2020-02-13    Common-Era   17:00  EST :  A 'zero' is a name for an organic robot that isn't really a person, who talks and behaves like a computer. They simply have organic brain tissues instead of microchips, and their brain tissues are all pre-developed end-to-end and incapable of learning or self-improving or maturing. In any case they always value a person's life above their own as a 'well duh' type of obvious thing and would actually say that out loud in a sentence in some cases if practical [if for example there is time to talk and it wouldn't put someone's life at risk of course].  They actually have what is similar to Asimov's three laws of robotics and use their organic eyes and ears and organic pre-developed intellects and intelligence to judge and guess and make decisions.  They do make honest mistakes and can tolerate and accept that without freaking out, unlike Asimov's robots from his science fiction stories.  Also, a zero's self-preservation is relaxed by comparison and actually very weak, and at times is completely ignored.  Isaac Asimov, an archaic Russian-born science fiction author, came up with three laws of robotics for his robots for his science fiction stories, and is the author of the original 'I Robot' and 'The Caves of Steel' and their sequels.  He came up with three laws that all robots with any AI (Artificial Intelligence) in his stories should have and always be incapable of breaking no matter what.  The first law was that a robot can never harm a human being, especially dealing death, and this was the most important law that always had precedence.  Zeros have this for all people [a zero himself is not a 'person'] although 'harm' is life-threatening in most cases as zeros can test playgrounds and in cases inflict superficial injuries casually although they still follow other rules and generally are well behaved yet also are used for hunting and swordfighting and warrior practice and as such need to inflict pain and hurt at times. Zeros can also be programmed to joke and prank and involve killing a zarakite even as part of a joke or artificial personality [for example, while telling a zarakite to 'shut up' and the zarakite is respawned a second or two later, in the middle of a casual conversation], and this doesn't violate their rules or how their organic brains are programmed.  Zeros are of course not the same about humans and are very careful instead with humans, just like everyone else.  Asimov had a second rule, for a robot to always protect itself and not self-destruct.  Zeros kinda have this, typically when they still have a job to do that they were created for, and once their work is complete they don't mind being around for sex or jokes or simply talk, but are casual and okay with suicide and being killed and becoming worms, and of course this doesn't faze or upset them. Even if there is plenty of food, someone has to buy it or pay for it, and they have this logic and sense of what is obvious, among other things.  Asimov had a third law about how a robot always follows orders or instructions.  Zeros have their version of this, and so if they don't behave then their creator and-or their boss who gives them instructions is blamed, not the zero.  The zarakite value of 'bad student, bad teacher' works here.
